2014-02-28 05:12:06
SQL: 			
				INSERT INTO in_exam_question (gid , content ,source) VALUES ('sx20140228051206_000001' , '


<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=gb2312">
<meta name="Generator" content="Microsoft Word 12 (filtered)">
<title>UNIT 8 How do you make a banana milk shake?</title>

 





<div class="Section1">

<p align="center"><b> UNIT 8 How do you make a banana milk shake? </b></p>

<p align="center"><b> Section A </b></p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 1 </b> (2011  ·广东清远中考  )I want to watch the basketball match. Would
you please ________ the TV? </p>

<p> A. turn on&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. turn off </p>

<p> C. turn down&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;D. turn up </p>

<p> 【解析】句意为：“我想看篮球赛，请问你能打开电视吗？”“打开”用  turn off  表示，故选  A  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  A </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 2  </b> &nbsp;Could you help me cut ________ the
meat for dumplings? </p>

<p> A. down&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. up&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C. into&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;D. off </p>

<p> 【解析】句意为：“你能帮我切碎包饺子的肉吗？”  cut up  意为“切碎，剪碎”，是固定短语，故选  B  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  B </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 3 </b> (2011  ·浙江衢州中考  )-- ________ do I save the document on the
computer? </p>

<p> --Please click
" save " and write a name for it. </p>

<p> A. What&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. How&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C. When&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;D. Where </p>

<p> 【解析】本题考查疑问词辨析。  what  意为“什么”；  how  意为“怎样”；  when  意为“什么时候”；  where  意为“什么地方”。根据题意“——我怎样在电脑上保存文件  ?   ——请点击保存键并为它起个名字”可知，应选“怎样”。故  B  项符合题意。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  B </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 4 </b> (2011  ·四川绵阳中考  )-- ________ does the baby mouse weigh? </p>

<p> --About 20 grams. </p>

<p> A. How much&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. How many </p>

<p> C. How&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;D. What </p>

<p> 【解析】句意为：“小老鼠有多重  ?   ”“大约  20  克  。”故选  A  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  A </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 5  </b> &nbsp;He ________ a pencil to write
with. </p>

<p> A. need&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. needs&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C. needing&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;D. to need </p>

<p> 【解析】分析句子结构可知，本句缺少谓语动词，首先排除  C  、  D  两项；主语  he  是第三人称单数，故谓语动词也要用第三人称单数形式，所以选  B  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  B </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 6  </b> &nbsp;(  宁夏银川中考  )I\'d like ________ and an apple. </p>

<p> A. three breads&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. three slices of breads </p>

<p> C. three slices of
bread&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;D. three slices bread </p>

<p> 【解析】本题考查不可数名词的数量。因  bread(  面包  )  是不可数名词，没有复数形式，故排除  A  、  B  两项。在表示不可数名词的量时可使用“  (  容器  )  单位  +of+  不可数名词”，所以答案应选  C  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  C </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 7  </b> &nbsp;Will you ________ more sugar
________ your coffee? </p>

<p> A. add; up&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. add up; to </p>

<p> C. add; to&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;D. add to; / </p>

<p> 【解析】  add  …  to  …意为“把……加到……上”。  add up  意为“把……加在一起”；  add to  意为“增添”；  add up to  意为“加起来总共……”。根据句意“你能再往你的咖啡里加些糖吗？”可知应选  C  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  C </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 8 </b> (2012  ·贵州黔西南州中考  )Sally works very hard. </p>

<p> Finally, she won
the first place. (  选出与画线部分意思相同或相近的选项  ) </p>

<p> A. At the end of&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;B. At last&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;C. Luckily&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;D. To the end </p>

<p> 【解析】由句意“萨利工作非常努力，最后她获得了一等奖”可知答案选  B  项，意为“最后”，  at last  相当于  finally  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  B </p>

<p align="center"><b> 语法精讲精练 </b></p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 1  </b> &nbsp;  根据汉语意思完成句子 </p>

<p> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  首先，我喜爱电脑游戏；其次，我只在空闲时间玩；再次，我会努力学习；最后，我希望你能理解我。 </p>

<p> &nbsp;________ , I
love computer games. ________ , I only play it in my free time. And 1 will work
hard at school. ________ , I hope you can understand me. </p>

<p> 【答案】  First; Next; Finally </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 2 </b> (2011  ·四川凉山中考  )Mom bought ________ oranges for me, but I\'d
like to drink some ________ . </p>

<p> A. many; oranges&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;B. much; orange&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;C. many; orange </p>

<p> 【解析】考查名词的用法。  oranges  为可数名词复数，应用  manv  来修饰，故排除  B  项。表示喝一些“橘汁”应用不可数名词  or-ange,   故选  C  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  C </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 1. (2012  ·宁夏中考  )The room was dark, so she
asked me to ________ the lights. </p>

<p> A. turn
up&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. turn down </p>

<p> C. turn
off&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. turn on </p>

<p> &nbsp;D&nbsp;   【解析】句意为：“这间屋很黑，因此她让我打开灯。”  turn
down  “调低”；  turn up  “调高”；  turn on  “打开”；  turn off  “关上”。根据句意可知选  D  。 </p>

<p> 2. (  北京中考  )Don\'t ________ the radio.
The baby is sleeping. </p>

<p> A. turn off </p>

<p> B. turn on </p>

<p> C. turn down </p>

<p> B&nbsp;   【解析】题意为“不要打开收音机。那个宝宝在睡觉呢”。故选  B  。 </p>

<p> ◆根据汉语意思完成句子 </p>

<p> 3.   请把电视机的声音关小点儿。 </p>

<p> Please the
________&nbsp; ________ television. </p>

<p> &nbsp;turn down  </p>

<p> ◆按要求完成句子 </p>

<p> 4. The man first
cut the tree down and then cut it up. (  改为同义句  ) </p>

<p> The man first cut
the tree down and then ________&nbsp; ________&nbsp; ________&nbsp; ________ . </p>

<p> cut it into pieces </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 5. Please cut
________ three bananas, three apples and a watermelon. </p>

<p> A.
of&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. down </p>

<p> C.
up&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. off </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】  cut up  意为“切碎，剪碎”，题意为“切碎三个香蕉、三个苹果和一个西瓜”。故选  C  。 </p>

<p> ◆根据汉语意思完成句子 </p>

<p> 6.   他们把这棵大树砍倒了。 </p>

<p> They
________&nbsp; ________ the big tree. </p>

<p> &nbsp;cut down </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 7. -- ________
your mother make a fruit salad? </p>

<p> --Mix up apples
and bananas. </p>

<p> A. How
do&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. How does </p>

<p> C. What
do&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. What does </p>

<p> B&nbsp;   【解析】主语  your mother  是第三人称单数，助动词用  does,   排除  A  、  C  两项，又根据答语可知是问方式，故选  B  。 </p>

<p> 8. (2012  ·山东济南中考  )-- ________ do you go to
work every day? </p>

<p> --By bike. </p>

<p> A.
What&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. Who&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C. How&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D.
When </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】根据答语  By bike  “骑自行车”可知，问句是对交通方式提问。故用疑问副词  how  。故选  C  。 </p>

<p> ◆根据汉语意思完成句子 </p>

<p> 9.   你妈妈每天怎样去上班？ </p>

<p> &nbsp;________&nbsp;
________ your mother go to work every day? </p>

<p> How does  </p>

<p> 10.   你觉得这本书怎么样？ </p>

<p> How do you
________ this book? </p>

<p> like  </p>

<p> ◆按要求完成句子 </p>

<p> 11. There are six
bags of rice in the room. (  对画线部分提问  ) </p>

<p> &nbsp;________&nbsp;
________ bags of rice are there in the room? </p>

<p> How many  </p>

<p> 12. Susan wants
six bottles of milk. (  对画线部分提问  ) </p>

<p> &nbsp;________&nbsp;
________ milk ________ Susan ________ ? </p>

<p> &nbsp;How much:
does; want </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 13. (  四川泸州中考  )How many ________ do you
want every week? </p>

<p> A.
milk&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. water&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C. apples </p>

<p> &nbsp;C&nbsp;   【解析】  many  后接可数名词复数形式。 </p>

<p> ◆用  how many  或  how much  填空 </p>

<p> 14. ________&nbsp;
________ salt do you put on French fries? </p>

<p> &nbsp;How much  </p>

<p> 15. ________&nbsp;
________ tomatoes does Jane put in salad? </p>

<p> &nbsp;How many </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 16. He needs
________ there early. </p>

<p> A.
going&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. to go </p>

<p> C.
go&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. to going </p>

<p> B&nbsp;   【解析】本题考查  need  的用法。由题中的  needs  可知  need  在此做实义动词。  need  做实义动词时，后常接不定式，即  need to do sth,   意为“需要做某事”。故选  B  。 </p>

<p> ◆按要求完成句子 </p>

<p> 17. The door needs
to be painted. (  改为否定句  ) </p>

<p> The door
________&nbsp; ________ to be painted. </p>

<p> doesn\'t need  </p>

<p> 18. Must I hand in
my homework now? (  作否定回答  ) </p>

<p> &nbsp;________ ,
you ________ . </p>

<p> No; needn\'t  </p>

<p> 19. You need to
take good care of your mother. (  改为一般疑问句  ) </p>

<p> &nbsp;________ I
________ to take good care of my mother? </p>

<p> Do; need </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 20. Give me
________ please. </p>

<p> A. two papers </p>

<p> B. two paper </p>

<p> C. two piece of
papers </p>

<p> D. two pieces of
paper </p>

<p> D&nbsp;   【解析】此题考查不可数名词“量”的表达法。若要计数，不可数名词的前面要加上表示单位的量词短语。故选  D  。 </p>

<p> 21. How many
________ can you see on the table? </p>

<p> A. bottles of
milks&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. bottle of milks </p>

<p> C. bottles of
milk&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. bottle of milk </p>

<p> 21  、  c&nbsp;   【解析】  milk  为不可数名词，没有复数形式，但可以被  a bottle of  来修饰，  how many  意思是“多少”，其后只能跟可数名词的复数形式。故选  C  。 </p>

<p> ◆用所给词的适当形式填空 </p>

<p> 22. I often eat
some ________ (egg)and a few pieces of ________ (bread)for breakfast. </p>

<p> eggs; bread  </p>

<p> 23. There are
three ________ (box) of ________ (apple)on the ground. </p>

<p> boxes; apples </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 24. Please
________ my name ________ the list. </p>

<p> A. add;
up&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. add; to </p>

<p> C. add;
in&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. add; on </p>

<p> &nbsp;B&nbsp;   【解析】  add  …  to  …意为“把……加到……上”。句意为“请把我的名字加到名单上”。其他各项与句意不符，故排除。 </p>

<p> 25. The engine(  发动机  )of the ship was out of
order(  出了故障  )and the
bad weather ________ the helplessness(  无助，绝望  )of the crew(  职员  )at sea. </p>

<p> A. added
to&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. resulted from </p>

<p> C. turned
out&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. made up </p>

<p> &nbsp;A&nbsp;   【解析】  add to  意为“增加”；  result from  意为“因而发生”；  turn out  意为“结果是，证明是”；  make up  意为“弥补，构成”。句意为“轮船的发动机出了故障，而且坏天气又增加了船员的绝望”。故正确答案是  A  。 </p>

<p> ◆根据汉语提示完成句子 </p>

<p> 26. (  江苏苏州中考  )Traditional Beijing opera
will be ________ (  增加  )to the music courses in 200 schools in China. </p>

<p> added&nbsp;   【解析】题意为“在中国，将有  200  所学校在音乐课中增加京剧”。  add traditional
Beijing opera to the music courses  “把京剧加到音乐课上”。 </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 27. The car wouldn\'t
start, so ________ we de-cided to go on foot. </p>

<p> A.
easily&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. hardly </p>

<p> C.
finally&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. nearly </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】由题意“汽车不能发动，所以最后我们决定步行去”可知，表示动作的先后顺序，故用  finally  。 </p>

<p> 28. (2011  ·陕西中考  )When he heard a cry for
help, he ran out as ________ as he could. </p>

<p> A.
hardly&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. quickly </p>

<p> C.
finally&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. slowly </p>

<p> &nbsp;B&nbsp;   【解析】句意为“当听到呼救声的时候，他尽可能快地跑了过去”。  quickly  “飞快地”，符合题意。故选  B  。 </p>

<p> 29. First, we\'ll
learn the phonetics, then the words. ________ we\'ll explain the text. </p>

<p> A.
finally&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. last </p>

<p> C. in the end
of&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. at the end </p>

<p> A </p>

<p> ◆根据汉语意思完成句子 </p>

<p> 30.   最后他将会成功。 </p>

<p> He will succeed
________ . </p>

<p> finally </p>

<p align="center"><b> 语法精讲精练 </b></p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 1. She turned on
the light, and ________ found her key on the desk. </p>

<p> A.
next&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. first </p>

<p> C.
then&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. the next </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】  then  表示一个动作在另一个动作之后，通常与  and  连用。 </p>

<p> 2. He will become
a teacher ________ . </p>

<p> A. at the end
of&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. finally </p>

<p> C. in the end </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】该句是一般将来时，  finally  一般用于对过去情况的叙述。故选  C  。 </p>

<p> 3. He looked
everywhere for his dictionary, but ________ he had to return home without it. </p>

<p> A. in the
end&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. at the end of </p>

<p> C. in the
finally&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. at the last </p>

<p> A </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 4. There are lots
of ________ in my little sister\'s room. </p>

<p> A. pictures
books&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. picture books </p>

<p> C. picture\'s
books&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. pictures book </p>

<p> &nbsp;B&nbsp;   【解析】名词做定语时，通常用单数，故选  B  。 </p>

<p> 5. (2011  ·河北中考  )We\'d better wait ________
more minutes. I think Jeff will come soon. </p>

<p> A. a
few&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. few </p>

<p> C. a
little&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. little </p>

<p> A&nbsp;   【解析】考查词语辨析。  minutes  是可数名词复数，排除  C  和  D,   由  Jeff will come soon  可知前句用肯定形式。“我们最好多等几分钟”，用  a few
more minutes  表示。 </p>

<p> 6. ________ to
stay there on Sundays. </p>

<p> A. Few children
want&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. Few childs want </p>

<p> C. Few children
wants&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. Few childs wants </p>

<p> &nbsp;A&nbsp;   【解析】  few  表示“很少”，修饰可数名词，该名词要用复数，谓语动词也要用复数。故选  A  。 </p>

<p> 7. (2011  ·广东清远中考  )I\'m so hungry.&nbsp;
Please give me ________ to eat. </p>

<p> A. three bread </p>

<p> B. three pieces of
bread </p>

<p> C. three pieces of
breads </p>

<p> D. three piece of
bread </p>

<p> &nbsp;B&nbsp;   【解析】考查可数名词与不可数名词的用法。  bread  为不可数名词，其复数不加  -s,   也不能直接用数字修饰，排除  A  和  C  。量词  piece  表示“片”，是可数名词，要加  -s  。故选  B  。 </p>

<p> 8. The bread is
too small. Give him a big ________ . </p>

<p> A.
one&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. bread&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C. piece&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D.   不填 </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】  bread  是不可数名词，“一块面包”应说  a piece of bread,
  不能说  a bread; one  只能代替可数名词单数，不能代替   bread,   故本题应选  c  。 </p>

<p> ◆用所给词的适当形式填空 </p>

<p> 9. There are too
many ________ (student)in the classroom. </p>

<p> students  </p>

<p> 10. There is too
________ (many)oil in the meat. </p>

<p> much  </p>

<p> 11. Two ________
(bottle)of beer will be enough. </p>

<p> bottles  </p>

<p> 12. He will be
here ten ________ (minute)later. </p>

<p> &nbsp;Minutes </p>

<p> 13.   She bought five ________
(knife)yesterday. </p>

<p> knives </p>

<p align="center"><b> &nbsp; </b></p>

<p align="center"><b> 综合强化训练 </b></p>

<p align="center"><b> 基础过关 </b></p>

<p> 一、单项选择 </p>

<p> 1. Here are some
vegetables. We have to ________ . </p>

<p> A. cut it
up&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. cut up it </p>

<p> C. cut them
up&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D.
cut up them </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】  cut up  意为“切碎”，代词做宾语时应放于短语之间；  vegetables  是可数名词的复数形式，故代词用  them  。故选  C  。 </p>

<p> 2. - ________
coffee do they need? </p>

<p> --Two cups. </p>

<p> A. How
many&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;B.
How long </p>

<p> C. How
far&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
D. How much </p>

<p> D&nbsp;   【解析】  coffee  是不可数名词，所以询问其数量用  how much  。 </p>

<p> 3. Add some sugar
________ the juice and it will be more delicious. </p>

<p> A.
in&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B.
at&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C.
to&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. on </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】  add  …  to  …意为“把……加到……上”。 </p>

<p> 4. -- ________
slices of turkey are there on the plate? </p>

<p> --Sorry, I don\'t
know. </p>

<p> A. How
many&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B.
How much </p>

<p> C. How
often&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
D. What </p>

<p> &nbsp;A&nbsp;   【解析】  slices  是可数名词的复数形式，故询问其数量应用  how many  。 </p>

<p> 5. --What can I do
for you? </p>

<p> --I\'d like two
________ . </p>

<p> A. bottle of
yogurt </p>

<p> B. bottle of
yogurts </p>

<p> C. bottles of
yogurt </p>

<p> D. bottles of
yogurts </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】  two bottles of yogurt  表示“  2  瓶酸奶”。 </p>

<p> 6. It\'s dark (  暗的  ) in the room. Please ________
the light. </p>

<p> A. turn
on&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. turn up </p>

<p> C. turn
clown&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
D. turn off </p>

<p> &nbsp;A&nbsp;   【解析】根据句意“房间里太暗了，请把灯打开”可知，空格处应填  turn
on  “打开”。 </p>

<p> 7. -- ________ do
you make the soup? </p>

<p> --Let me tell you
the way. </p>

<p> A.
What&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. Which&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C.
How&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. When </p>

<p> &nbsp;C&nbsp;   【解析】根据答句“让我告诉你方法”可知问句是询问“怎样做汤”。故选  C  。  8.
--The cake is delicious. Can you give me ________ one? </p>

<p> --Yes, please. </p>

<p> A.
other&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.
the other </p>

<p> C.
another&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
D. the others </p>

<p> &nbsp;C&nbsp;   【解析】根据句意“这个蛋糕很好吃。你能再给我一个吗？”可知，空格处应用  another,   表示“再一个，又一个”。 </p>

<p> 9. Don\'t forget
________ your bag when you go to school. </p>

<p> A.
taking&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. takes&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C.
take&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. to take </p>

<p> &nbsp;D&nbsp;   【解析】  forget doing sth  “忘记已经做过的事  (  做了  )  ”，  forget to do sth  “忘记将要做的事  (  未做  )  ”。根据句意“上学的时候不要忘记带书包”可知，此处用  forget
to do sth  。 </p>

<p> 10. --Let\'s make
Beijing Duck for dinner. </p>

<p> -- ________ . </p>

<p> A. Yes, I
can&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B.
You are right </p>

<p> C. No, I
don\'t&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. Good
idea </p>

<p> D&nbsp;   【解析】  Let\'s  …是提建议的句子。对其的肯定答语是  Good idea.   ，故选  D  。 </p>

<p> 二、将方框中的名词进行分类 </p>

<table table="" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="535">
 <tbody><tr>
  <td width="535" valign="top">
  <p> water, foot,
  milk, honey, yogurt, lake, subway, bowl,&nbsp; meat, teaspoon, cheese,
  machine </p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</tbody></table>

<p> 不可数名词：  1. ________ 2. ________ 3. ________  </p>

<p> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
4. ________ 5. ________ 6. ________  </p>

<p> 可数名词：  7. ________ 8. ________ 9. ________  </p>

<p> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
10. ________ 11. ________ 12. ________  </p>

<p> 1. water 2. milk
3. honey 4. yogurt 5. meat 6. cheese </p>

<p> 7. lake 8. subway
9. bowl 10. teaspoon 11. machine 12. foot </p>

<p> 三、根据句意及首字母或汉语提示完成单词 </p>

<p> 1. "F
________ " means "at last\'. </p>

<p> Finally  </p>

<p> 2. Could you pass
me some ________ (  盐  )?
I need add some into the soup. </p>

<p> salt  </p>

<p> 3. Please p
________ the bananas before you eat them. </p>

<p> &nbsp;peel  </p>

<p> 4. --What kind of
fruit do you like best? </p>

<p> --I like ________
(  西瓜  ). </p>

<p> watermelon(s)  </p>

<p> 5. Please pour the
milk and ice cream in the b ________ (  搅拌器  ). </p>

<p> &nbsp;blender </p>

<p> 四、根据汉语意思完成句子 </p>

<p> 1.   把香蕉和冰淇淋放进搅拌机里。 </p>

<p> &nbsp;________ the
bananas and ice cream ________ the blender. </p>

<p> Put; into  </p>

<p> 2.   你怎样做苹果奶昔？ </p>

<p> &nbsp;________ do
you ________&nbsp; ________&nbsp; ________ milk shake? </p>

<p> &nbsp;How; make an
apple </p>

<p> 3.   不要忘记向汤里加上盐。 </p>

<p> Don\'t forget
________&nbsp; ________ some salt ________ the soup. </p>

<p> to add; to </p>

<p> 4.   让我们做香蕉奶昔吧。 </p>

<p> &nbsp;________&nbsp;
________ a banana milk shake. </p>

<p> &nbsp;Let\'s make  </p>

<p> 5.   你能把这些西红柿切成片吗？ </p>

<p> Can you
________&nbsp; ________ these tomatoes ________ slices? </p>

<p> &nbsp;cut up; into </p>

<p> 五、从方框中选择合适的词或词组完成短文 </p>

<div align="center">

<table table="" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="283">
 <tbody><tr>
  <td width="283" valign="top">
  <p> finally, in, a
  cup of, then, next, cut up, first </p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</tbody></table>

</div>

<p> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
____<u>1</u>____ , ____<u>2</u>____ three bananas, three apples and a
watermelon. ____<u>3</u>____ , put the fruit ____<u>4</u>____ a bowl. ____<u>5</u>____
, put in two teaspoons of cinnamon and ____<u>6</u>____&nbsp; yogurt. ____<u>7</u>____
, mix it all up. You can enjoy it. </p>

<p> 1. First 2. cut up
3. Next 4. in 5. Then 6. a cup of 7. Finally </p>

<p><a name="_GoBack"></a> &nbsp; </p>

</div>

<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=gb2312">
<meta name="Generator" content="Microsoft Word 12 (filtered)">
<title>UNIT 8 How do you make a banana milk shake?</title>

 





<div class="Section1">

<p align="center"><b> UNIT 8 How do you make a banana milk shake? </b></p>

<p align="center"><b> Section A </b></p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 1 </b> (2011  ·广东清远中考  )I want to watch the basketball match. Would
you please ________ the TV? </p>

<p> A. turn on&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. turn off </p>

<p> C. turn down&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;D. turn up </p>

<p> 【解析】句意为：“我想看篮球赛，请问你能打开电视吗？”“打开”用  turn off  表示，故选  A  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  A </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 2  </b> &nbsp;Could you help me cut ________ the
meat for dumplings? </p>

<p> A. down&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. up&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C. into&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;D. off </p>

<p> 【解析】句意为：“你能帮我切碎包饺子的肉吗？”  cut up  意为“切碎，剪碎”，是固定短语，故选  B  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  B </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 3 </b> (2011  ·浙江衢州中考  )-- ________ do I save the document on the
computer? </p>

<p> --Please click
" save " and write a name for it. </p>

<p> A. What&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. How&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C. When&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;D. Where </p>

<p> 【解析】本题考查疑问词辨析。  what  意为“什么”；  how  意为“怎样”；  when  意为“什么时候”；  where  意为“什么地方”。根据题意“——我怎样在电脑上保存文件  ?   ——请点击保存键并为它起个名字”可知，应选“怎样”。故  B  项符合题意。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  B </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 4 </b> (2011  ·四川绵阳中考  )-- ________ does the baby mouse weigh? </p>

<p> --About 20 grams. </p>

<p> A. How much&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. How many </p>

<p> C. How&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;D. What </p>

<p> 【解析】句意为：“小老鼠有多重  ?   ”“大约  20  克  。”故选  A  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  A </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 5  </b> &nbsp;He ________ a pencil to write
with. </p>

<p> A. need&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. needs&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C. needing&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;D. to need </p>

<p> 【解析】分析句子结构可知，本句缺少谓语动词，首先排除  C  、  D  两项；主语  he  是第三人称单数，故谓语动词也要用第三人称单数形式，所以选  B  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  B </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 6  </b> &nbsp;(  宁夏银川中考  )I\'d like ________ and an apple. </p>

<p> A. three breads&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. three slices of breads </p>

<p> C. three slices of
bread&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;D. three slices bread </p>

<p> 【解析】本题考查不可数名词的数量。因  bread(  面包  )  是不可数名词，没有复数形式，故排除  A  、  B  两项。在表示不可数名词的量时可使用“  (  容器  )  单位  +of+  不可数名词”，所以答案应选  C  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  C </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 7  </b> &nbsp;Will you ________ more sugar
________ your coffee? </p>

<p> A. add; up&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. add up; to </p>

<p> C. add; to&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;D. add to; / </p>

<p> 【解析】  add  …  to  …意为“把……加到……上”。  add up  意为“把……加在一起”；  add to  意为“增添”；  add up to  意为“加起来总共……”。根据句意“你能再往你的咖啡里加些糖吗？”可知应选  C  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  C </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 8 </b> (2012  ·贵州黔西南州中考  )Sally works very hard. </p>

<p> Finally, she won
the first place. (  选出与画线部分意思相同或相近的选项  ) </p>

<p> A. At the end of&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;B. At last&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;C. Luckily&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;D. To the end </p>

<p> 【解析】由句意“萨利工作非常努力，最后她获得了一等奖”可知答案选  B  项，意为“最后”，  at last  相当于  finally  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  B </p>

<p align="center"><b> 语法精讲精练 </b></p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 1  </b> &nbsp;  根据汉语意思完成句子 </p>

<p> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  首先，我喜爱电脑游戏；其次，我只在空闲时间玩；再次，我会努力学习；最后，我希望你能理解我。 </p>

<p> &nbsp;________ , I
love computer games. ________ , I only play it in my free time. And 1 will work
hard at school. ________ , I hope you can understand me. </p>

<p> 【答案】  First; Next; Finally </p>

<p><b> 例 </b><b> 2 </b> (2011  ·四川凉山中考  )Mom bought ________ oranges for me, but I\'d
like to drink some ________ . </p>

<p> A. many; oranges&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;B. much; orange&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;C. many; orange </p>

<p> 【解析】考查名词的用法。  oranges  为可数名词复数，应用  manv  来修饰，故排除  B  项。表示喝一些“橘汁”应用不可数名词  or-ange,   故选  C  。 </p>

<p> 【答案】  C </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 1. (2012  ·宁夏中考  )The room was dark, so she
asked me to ________ the lights. </p>

<p> A. turn
up&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. turn down </p>

<p> C. turn
off&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. turn on </p>

<p> &nbsp;D&nbsp;   【解析】句意为：“这间屋很黑，因此她让我打开灯。”  turn
down  “调低”；  turn up  “调高”；  turn on  “打开”；  turn off  “关上”。根据句意可知选  D  。 </p>

<p> 2. (  北京中考  )Don\'t ________ the radio.
The baby is sleeping. </p>

<p> A. turn off </p>

<p> B. turn on </p>

<p> C. turn down </p>

<p> B&nbsp;   【解析】题意为“不要打开收音机。那个宝宝在睡觉呢”。故选  B  。 </p>

<p> ◆根据汉语意思完成句子 </p>

<p> 3.   请把电视机的声音关小点儿。 </p>

<p> Please the
________&nbsp; ________ television. </p>

<p> &nbsp;turn down  </p>

<p> ◆按要求完成句子 </p>

<p> 4. The man first
cut the tree down and then cut it up. (  改为同义句  ) </p>

<p> The man first cut
the tree down and then ________&nbsp; ________&nbsp; ________&nbsp; ________ . </p>

<p> cut it into pieces </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 5. Please cut
________ three bananas, three apples and a watermelon. </p>

<p> A.
of&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. down </p>

<p> C.
up&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. off </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】  cut up  意为“切碎，剪碎”，题意为“切碎三个香蕉、三个苹果和一个西瓜”。故选  C  。 </p>

<p> ◆根据汉语意思完成句子 </p>

<p> 6.   他们把这棵大树砍倒了。 </p>

<p> They
________&nbsp; ________ the big tree. </p>

<p> &nbsp;cut down </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 7. -- ________
your mother make a fruit salad? </p>

<p> --Mix up apples
and bananas. </p>

<p> A. How
do&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. How does </p>

<p> C. What
do&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. What does </p>

<p> B&nbsp;   【解析】主语  your mother  是第三人称单数，助动词用  does,   排除  A  、  C  两项，又根据答语可知是问方式，故选  B  。 </p>

<p> 8. (2012  ·山东济南中考  )-- ________ do you go to
work every day? </p>

<p> --By bike. </p>

<p> A.
What&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. Who&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C. How&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D.
When </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】根据答语  By bike  “骑自行车”可知，问句是对交通方式提问。故用疑问副词  how  。故选  C  。 </p>

<p> ◆根据汉语意思完成句子 </p>

<p> 9.   你妈妈每天怎样去上班？ </p>

<p> &nbsp;________&nbsp;
________ your mother go to work every day? </p>

<p> How does  </p>

<p> 10.   你觉得这本书怎么样？ </p>

<p> How do you
________ this book? </p>

<p> like  </p>

<p> ◆按要求完成句子 </p>

<p> 11. There are six
bags of rice in the room. (  对画线部分提问  ) </p>

<p> &nbsp;________&nbsp;
________ bags of rice are there in the room? </p>

<p> How many  </p>

<p> 12. Susan wants
six bottles of milk. (  对画线部分提问  ) </p>

<p> &nbsp;________&nbsp;
________ milk ________ Susan ________ ? </p>

<p> &nbsp;How much:
does; want </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 13. (  四川泸州中考  )How many ________ do you
want every week? </p>

<p> A.
milk&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. water&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C. apples </p>

<p> &nbsp;C&nbsp;   【解析】  many  后接可数名词复数形式。 </p>

<p> ◆用  how many  或  how much  填空 </p>

<p> 14. ________&nbsp;
________ salt do you put on French fries? </p>

<p> &nbsp;How much  </p>

<p> 15. ________&nbsp;
________ tomatoes does Jane put in salad? </p>

<p> &nbsp;How many </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 16. He needs
________ there early. </p>

<p> A.
going&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. to go </p>

<p> C.
go&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. to going </p>

<p> B&nbsp;   【解析】本题考查  need  的用法。由题中的  needs  可知  need  在此做实义动词。  need  做实义动词时，后常接不定式，即  need to do sth,   意为“需要做某事”。故选  B  。 </p>

<p> ◆按要求完成句子 </p>

<p> 17. The door needs
to be painted. (  改为否定句  ) </p>

<p> The door
________&nbsp; ________ to be painted. </p>

<p> doesn\'t need  </p>

<p> 18. Must I hand in
my homework now? (  作否定回答  ) </p>

<p> &nbsp;________ ,
you ________ . </p>

<p> No; needn\'t  </p>

<p> 19. You need to
take good care of your mother. (  改为一般疑问句  ) </p>

<p> &nbsp;________ I
________ to take good care of my mother? </p>

<p> Do; need </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 20. Give me
________ please. </p>

<p> A. two papers </p>

<p> B. two paper </p>

<p> C. two piece of
papers </p>

<p> D. two pieces of
paper </p>

<p> D&nbsp;   【解析】此题考查不可数名词“量”的表达法。若要计数，不可数名词的前面要加上表示单位的量词短语。故选  D  。 </p>

<p> 21. How many
________ can you see on the table? </p>

<p> A. bottles of
milks&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. bottle of milks </p>

<p> C. bottles of
milk&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. bottle of milk </p>

<p> 21  、  c&nbsp;   【解析】  milk  为不可数名词，没有复数形式，但可以被  a bottle of  来修饰，  how many  意思是“多少”，其后只能跟可数名词的复数形式。故选  C  。 </p>

<p> ◆用所给词的适当形式填空 </p>

<p> 22. I often eat
some ________ (egg)and a few pieces of ________ (bread)for breakfast. </p>

<p> eggs; bread  </p>

<p> 23. There are
three ________ (box) of ________ (apple)on the ground. </p>

<p> boxes; apples </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 24. Please
________ my name ________ the list. </p>

<p> A. add;
up&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. add; to </p>

<p> C. add;
in&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. add; on </p>

<p> &nbsp;B&nbsp;   【解析】  add  …  to  …意为“把……加到……上”。句意为“请把我的名字加到名单上”。其他各项与句意不符，故排除。 </p>

<p> 25. The engine(  发动机  )of the ship was out of
order(  出了故障  )and the
bad weather ________ the helplessness(  无助，绝望  )of the crew(  职员  )at sea. </p>

<p> A. added
to&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. resulted from </p>

<p> C. turned
out&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. made up </p>

<p> &nbsp;A&nbsp;   【解析】  add to  意为“增加”；  result from  意为“因而发生”；  turn out  意为“结果是，证明是”；  make up  意为“弥补，构成”。句意为“轮船的发动机出了故障，而且坏天气又增加了船员的绝望”。故正确答案是  A  。 </p>

<p> ◆根据汉语提示完成句子 </p>

<p> 26. (  江苏苏州中考  )Traditional Beijing opera
will be ________ (  增加  )to the music courses in 200 schools in China. </p>

<p> added&nbsp;   【解析】题意为“在中国，将有  200  所学校在音乐课中增加京剧”。  add traditional
Beijing opera to the music courses  “把京剧加到音乐课上”。 </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 27. The car wouldn\'t
start, so ________ we de-cided to go on foot. </p>

<p> A.
easily&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. hardly </p>

<p> C.
finally&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. nearly </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】由题意“汽车不能发动，所以最后我们决定步行去”可知，表示动作的先后顺序，故用  finally  。 </p>

<p> 28. (2011  ·陕西中考  )When he heard a cry for
help, he ran out as ________ as he could. </p>

<p> A.
hardly&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. quickly </p>

<p> C.
finally&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. slowly </p>

<p> &nbsp;B&nbsp;   【解析】句意为“当听到呼救声的时候，他尽可能快地跑了过去”。  quickly  “飞快地”，符合题意。故选  B  。 </p>

<p> 29. First, we\'ll
learn the phonetics, then the words. ________ we\'ll explain the text. </p>

<p> A.
finally&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. last </p>

<p> C. in the end
of&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. at the end </p>

<p> A </p>

<p> ◆根据汉语意思完成句子 </p>

<p> 30.   最后他将会成功。 </p>

<p> He will succeed
________ . </p>

<p> finally </p>

<p align="center"><b> 语法精讲精练 </b></p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 1. She turned on
the light, and ________ found her key on the desk. </p>

<p> A.
next&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. first </p>

<p> C.
then&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. the next </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】  then  表示一个动作在另一个动作之后，通常与  and  连用。 </p>

<p> 2. He will become
a teacher ________ . </p>

<p> A. at the end
of&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. finally </p>

<p> C. in the end </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】该句是一般将来时，  finally  一般用于对过去情况的叙述。故选  C  。 </p>

<p> 3. He looked
everywhere for his dictionary, but ________ he had to return home without it. </p>

<p> A. in the
end&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. at the end of </p>

<p> C. in the
finally&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. at the last </p>

<p> A </p>

<p> ◆单项选择 </p>

<p> 4. There are lots
of ________ in my little sister\'s room. </p>

<p> A. pictures
books&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. picture books </p>

<p> C. picture\'s
books&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. pictures book </p>

<p> &nbsp;B&nbsp;   【解析】名词做定语时，通常用单数，故选  B  。 </p>

<p> 5. (2011  ·河北中考  )We\'d better wait ________
more minutes. I think Jeff will come soon. </p>

<p> A. a
few&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. few </p>

<p> C. a
little&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. little </p>

<p> A&nbsp;   【解析】考查词语辨析。  minutes  是可数名词复数，排除  C  和  D,   由  Jeff will come soon  可知前句用肯定形式。“我们最好多等几分钟”，用  a few
more minutes  表示。 </p>

<p> 6. ________ to
stay there on Sundays. </p>

<p> A. Few children
want&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. Few childs want </p>

<p> C. Few children
wants&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. Few childs wants </p>

<p> &nbsp;A&nbsp;   【解析】  few  表示“很少”，修饰可数名词，该名词要用复数，谓语动词也要用复数。故选  A  。 </p>

<p> 7. (2011  ·广东清远中考  )I\'m so hungry.&nbsp;
Please give me ________ to eat. </p>

<p> A. three bread </p>

<p> B. three pieces of
bread </p>

<p> C. three pieces of
breads </p>

<p> D. three piece of
bread </p>

<p> &nbsp;B&nbsp;   【解析】考查可数名词与不可数名词的用法。  bread  为不可数名词，其复数不加  -s,   也不能直接用数字修饰，排除  A  和  C  。量词  piece  表示“片”，是可数名词，要加  -s  。故选  B  。 </p>

<p> 8. The bread is
too small. Give him a big ________ . </p>

<p> A.
one&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. bread&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C. piece&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D.   不填 </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】  bread  是不可数名词，“一块面包”应说  a piece of bread,
  不能说  a bread; one  只能代替可数名词单数，不能代替   bread,   故本题应选  c  。 </p>

<p> ◆用所给词的适当形式填空 </p>

<p> 9. There are too
many ________ (student)in the classroom. </p>

<p> students  </p>

<p> 10. There is too
________ (many)oil in the meat. </p>

<p> much  </p>

<p> 11. Two ________
(bottle)of beer will be enough. </p>

<p> bottles  </p>

<p> 12. He will be
here ten ________ (minute)later. </p>

<p> &nbsp;Minutes </p>

<p> 13.   She bought five ________
(knife)yesterday. </p>

<p> knives </p>

<p align="center"><b> &nbsp; </b></p>

<p align="center"><b> 综合强化训练 </b></p>

<p align="center"><b> 基础过关 </b></p>

<p> 一、单项选择 </p>

<p> 1. Here are some
vegetables. We have to ________ . </p>

<p> A. cut it
up&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. cut up it </p>

<p> C. cut them
up&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D.
cut up them </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】  cut up  意为“切碎”，代词做宾语时应放于短语之间；  vegetables  是可数名词的复数形式，故代词用  them  。故选  C  。 </p>

<p> 2. - ________
coffee do they need? </p>

<p> --Two cups. </p>

<p> A. How
many&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;B.
How long </p>

<p> C. How
far&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
D. How much </p>

<p> D&nbsp;   【解析】  coffee  是不可数名词，所以询问其数量用  how much  。 </p>

<p> 3. Add some sugar
________ the juice and it will be more delicious. </p>

<p> A.
in&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B.
at&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C.
to&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. on </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】  add  …  to  …意为“把……加到……上”。 </p>

<p> 4. -- ________
slices of turkey are there on the plate? </p>

<p> --Sorry, I don\'t
know. </p>

<p> A. How
many&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B.
How much </p>

<p> C. How
often&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
D. What </p>

<p> &nbsp;A&nbsp;   【解析】  slices  是可数名词的复数形式，故询问其数量应用  how many  。 </p>

<p> 5. --What can I do
for you? </p>

<p> --I\'d like two
________ . </p>

<p> A. bottle of
yogurt </p>

<p> B. bottle of
yogurts </p>

<p> C. bottles of
yogurt </p>

<p> D. bottles of
yogurts </p>

<p> C&nbsp;   【解析】  two bottles of yogurt  表示“  2  瓶酸奶”。 </p>

<p> 6. It\'s dark (  暗的  ) in the room. Please ________
the light. </p>

<p> A. turn
on&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
B. turn up </p>

<p> C. turn
clown&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
D. turn off </p>

<p> &nbsp;A&nbsp;   【解析】根据句意“房间里太暗了，请把灯打开”可知，空格处应填  turn
on  “打开”。 </p>

<p> 7. -- ________ do
you make the soup? </p>

<p> --Let me tell you
the way. </p>

<p> A.
What&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. Which&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C.
How&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. When </p>

<p> &nbsp;C&nbsp;   【解析】根据答句“让我告诉你方法”可知问句是询问“怎样做汤”。故选  C  。  8.
--The cake is delicious. Can you give me ________ one? </p>

<p> --Yes, please. </p>

<p> A.
other&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.
the other </p>

<p> C.
another&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
D. the others </p>

<p> &nbsp;C&nbsp;   【解析】根据句意“这个蛋糕很好吃。你能再给我一个吗？”可知，空格处应用  another,   表示“再一个，又一个”。 </p>

<p> 9. Don\'t forget
________ your bag when you go to school. </p>

<p> A.
taking&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. takes&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C.
take&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. to take </p>

<p> &nbsp;D&nbsp;   【解析】  forget doing sth  “忘记已经做过的事  (  做了  )  ”，  forget to do sth  “忘记将要做的事  (  未做  )  ”。根据句意“上学的时候不要忘记带书包”可知，此处用  forget
to do sth  。 </p>

<p> 10. --Let\'s make
Beijing Duck for dinner. </p>

<p> -- ________ . </p>

<p> A. Yes, I
can&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B.
You are right </p>

<p> C. No, I
don\'t&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. Good
idea </p>

<p> D&nbsp;   【解析】  Let\'s  …是提建议的句子。对其的肯定答语是  Good idea.   ，故选  D  。 </p>

<p> 二、将方框中的名词进行分类 </p>

<table table="" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="535">
 <tbody><tr>
  <td width="535" valign="top">
  <p> water, foot,
  milk, honey, yogurt, lake, subway, bowl,&nbsp; meat, teaspoon, cheese,
  machine </p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</tbody></table>

<p> 不可数名词：  1. ________ 2. ________ 3. ________  </p>

<p> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
4. ________ 5. ________ 6. ________  </p>

<p> 可数名词：  7. ________ 8. ________ 9. ________  </p>

<p> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
10. ________ 11. ________ 12. ________  </p>

<p> 1. water 2. milk
3. honey 4. yogurt 5. meat 6. cheese </p>

<p> 7. lake 8. subway
9. bowl 10. teaspoon 11. machine 12. foot </p>

<p> 三、根据句意及首字母或汉语提示完成单词 </p>

<p> 1. "F
________ " means "at last\'. </p>

<p> Finally  </p>

<p> 2. Could you pass
me some ________ (  盐  )?
I need add some into the soup. </p>

<p> salt  </p>

<p> 3. Please p
________ the bananas before you eat them. </p>

<p> &nbsp;peel  </p>

<p> 4. --What kind of
fruit do you like best? </p>

<p> --I like ________
(  西瓜  ). </p>

<p> watermelon(s)  </p>

<p> 5. Please pour the
milk and ice cream in the b ________ (  搅拌器  ). </p>

<p> &nbsp;blender </p>

<p> 四、根据汉语意思完成句子 </p>

<p> 1.   把香蕉和冰淇淋放进搅拌机里。 </p>

<p> &nbsp;________ the
bananas and ice cream ________ the blender. </p>

<p> Put; into  </p>

<p> 2.   你怎样做苹果奶昔？ </p>

<p> &nbsp;________ do
you ________&nbsp; ________&nbsp; ________ milk shake? </p>

<p> &nbsp;How; make an
apple </p>

<p> 3.   不要忘记向汤里加上盐。 </p>

<p> Don\'t forget
________&nbsp; ________ some salt ________ the soup. </p>

<p> to add; to </p>

<p> 4.   让我们做香蕉奶昔吧。 </p>

<p> &nbsp;________&nbsp;
________ a banana milk shake. </p>

<p> &nbsp;Let\'s make  </p>

<p> 5.   你能把这些西红柿切成片吗？ </p>

<p> Can you
________&nbsp; ________ these tomatoes ________ slices? </p>

<p> &nbsp;cut up; into </p>

<p> 五、从方框中选择合适的词或词组完成短文 </p>

<div align="center">

<table table="" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="283">
 <tbody><tr>
  <td width="283" valign="top">
  <p> finally, in, a
  cup of, then, next, cut up, first </p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</tbody></table>

</div>

<p> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
____<u>1</u>____ , ____<u>2</u>____ three bananas, three apples and a
watermelon. ____<u>3</u>____ , put the fruit ____<u>4</u>____ a bowl. ____<u>5</u>____
, put in two teaspoons of cinnamon and ____<u>6</u>____&nbsp; yogurt. ____<u>7</u>____
, mix it all up. You can enjoy it. </p>

<p> 1. First 2. cut up
3. Next 4. in 5. Then 6. a cup of 7. Finally </p>

SQL: 		
		SELECT t1.* , IFNULL(t3.member_count , 0) as member_count , t4.username FROM hx_user_group t1 
		JOIN (
				SELECT hx_user_group.ancestor_id,hx_user_group.id,hx_user_group.parent_id FROM hx_user 
			    JOIN hx_user_group ON hx_user.group_id=hx_user_group.id WHERE hx_user.id=1
		) t2 ON t1.ancestor_id LIKE IF(t2.parent_id=0 , '%' , IF(LENGTH(t2.ancestor_id)>0 , concat(t2.ancestor_id ,'_' , t2.id , '%') , concat(t2.id , '%'))) 		
		LEFT JOIN (
			SELECT group_id , count(*) as member_count FROM hx_user GROUP BY group_id
		) t3 ON t1.id=t3.group_id  
	    LEFT JOIN hx_user t4 ON t1.creator_id=t4.id
		ORDER BY t1.ancestor_id ASC 
		LIMIT NaN,10;

SQL: 		
		SELECT t1.* ,
		t5.username ,	t4.name as type_name , t2.name as action_name , t3.name as entity , 
		t1.note , t1.old_value , t1.new_value , t6.book_name as entity_name
		FROM base_version_history t1
		JOIN base_history_action t2 ON t1.action_id=t2.id
		JOIN edu_entity_type t3 ON t1.entity_type=t3.id
		JOIN edu_source_type t4 ON t1.source_type=t4.id
		JOIN hx_curriculumn.hx_user t5 ON t1.user_id=t5.id
		JOIN edu_total_book t6 ON t1.element_id=t6.id AND t1.entity_type=10
